vote.title: To authorize the Finance and Management Director to modify a contract with Trebel LLC for the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation project; to waive the competitive bidding provisions of Chapter 329 of the Columbus City Codes. ($0.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND: This legislation authorizes the Finance and Management Director to modifya contract with Trebel LLC, extending the contract for an additional five-year termfor the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation project. Trebel LLC assists the City with developing, implementing, and managing the Community Choice Aggregation program.
 
The Department of Finance and Management conducted a competitive Request for Proposals process in 2020 and Trebel was the selected offeror.
 
No additional funds need expended under this modification. The initial contract engaged in 2020 had a three year term, with two subsequent one-year renewal options. At this time, Sustainable Columbus finds it most appropriate to engage this brokerage agreement for a five year contract given the complexities of the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation project, the 13-year lifespan of the existing Master Service Agreement, and Trebel’s presence throughout the Master Service Agreement’s terms and conditions. 
 
Given these considerations and the lack of monetary necessity with this contract, the Department is also requesting to waive the competitive bidding process. 
 
Trebel LLC Contract Compliance No. 27-3437017
 
Fiscal Impact:  No funding is required for this legislation. Trebel LLC will be paid for services through an administrative fee per megawatt, kilowatt hour, or similar usage metric by the energy supplier for the City of Columbus’ aggregation program(s) initial energy supply term.
Title
To authorize the Finance and Management Director to modify a contract with Trebel LLC for the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation project; to waive the competitive bidding provisions of Chapter 329 of the Columbus City Codes. ($0.00)
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the Finance and Management Department, Office of Construction Management desires to modify a contract with Trebel LLC for the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation; and
 
WHEREAS, the Department of Finance and Management solicited Request for Proposals for the Sustainable Columbus Community Choice Aggregation and Trebel LLC was the selected Offeror; NOW, THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1. That the Director of the Department of Finance and Management is hereby authorized to modify a contract with Trebel LLC for implementation of the Sustainable Columbus Choice Aggregation program.
 
SECTION 2. That no funding from the City is required for this contract.  The energy supplier shall be responsible for payments to Trebel LLC.
SECTION 3.  That Council finds it to be in the best interests of the City to waive the competitive bidding provisions of Chapter 329 of the Columbus City Codes for this contract, and does hereby waive the same.
SECTION 4. That this Ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
